    • Method Detail

      • saveDatabase

        void saveDatabase()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Backs up the current database to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • loadDatabase

        static SystemDatabase loadDatabase(java.lang.String databasePath)
                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Loads a backed up database.
        Parameters:
        databasePath - the path of the database to load
        Returns:
        the database object loaded, null if no database file was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • putchunkUpdate

        public void putchunkUpdate(ProtocolState state,
                           int size)
        Updates the database with the received PUTCHUNK message info about a chunk. Inserts new chunk info if it didn't exist or updates desired replication degree if already existed.
        Parameters:
        state - the Protocol State object relevant to this operation
        size - the size of the chunk in KB

      • storedUpdate

        public void storedUpdate(ProtocolState state)
        Updates the database with the received STORED message info about a chunk. Adds the sender ID to the perceived replication degree hash map.
        Parameters:
        state - the Protocol State object relevant to this operation

      • deleteUpdate

        public void deleteUpdate(ProtocolState state)
        Removes all database info of the SHA256 from the initiated backups database and from the chunks database.
        Parameters:
        state - the Protocol State object relevant to this operation

      • backupUpdate

        public void backupUpdate(ProtocolState state)
        Updates the database with the initiated backup. Inserts new file info. If file info already exists updates the file path and desired replication degree.
        Parameters:
        state - the Protocol State object relevant to this operation

      • removedUpdate

        public int removedUpdate(ProtocolState state)
        Updates the database with the REMOVED message info. Removes the sender ID from the perceived replication degree hash map.
        Parameters:
        state - the Protocol State object relevant to this operation
        Returns:
        the desired replication degree for this chunk

      • addToDelete

        public void addToDelete(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> peers,
                        java.lang.String hash)
        Adds to the database the given hash as being flagged for later deletion for each given Peer.
        Parameters:
        peers - the peers that haven't deleted the file
        hash - textual representation of the hexadecimal values of a SHA256

      • removeFromDelete

        public void removeFromDelete(int peer,
                             java.lang.String hash)
        Removes from the database the pending deletion identified by the given hash and Peer ID.
        Parameters:
        peer - the peer that had a pending deletion
        hash - textual representation of the hexadecimal values of a SHA256

      • retrieveFileInfo

        public FileInfo retrieveFileInfo(java.lang.String name)
        Uses the specified string to find a file info in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the filename / filepath of the file info to retrieve
        Returns:
        the file info found, null if not found

      • getChunks

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Long,ChunkInfo>> getChunks()
        Returns:
        the hash map of hash maps containing info about chunks in the system

      • setChunks

        public void setChunks(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Long,ChunkInfo>> chunks)
        Parameters:
        chunks - the hash map of hash maps containing info about chunks in the system

      • getInitiatedFiles

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,FileInfo> getInitiatedFiles()
        Returns:
        the hash map containing info about backed up files by this peer

      • setInitiatedFiles

        public void setInitiatedFiles(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,FileInfo> initiatedFiles)
        Parameters:
        initiatedFiles - the hash map containing info about backed up files by this peer

      • getFilesToDelete

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> getFilesToDelete()
        Returns:
        the hash map containing the files not yet deleted

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
